Package no.uio.duo.policy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IntendedPolicyInterface
    Interface to be implemented by any class which will make decisions about the intended policy on a bitstream under specific circumstances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContextualBitstream
    Class which represents the unique combination of a bitstream and the bundle that it appears in
    DuoEmbargoSetter
    Implementation of the DSpace EmbargoSetter interface which applies the duo policy pattern where appropriate.
    DuoPolicyCurationTask
    Curation task which allows the PolicyPatternManager to be run from the user interface or the command line
    IntendedPolicy
    Class to represet the Anonymous READ policy that a bitstream is intended to have.
    IntendedPolicyExisting
    Implementation of the IntededPolicyInterface which can determine the correct policy to be present on a bitstream for an item that already exists in the repository.
    IntendedPolicyNew
    Implementation of the IndentedPolicyInterface which can determine the correct policy to be present on a bitstream for an item that is newly submitted to the repository.
    LivePolicyTest
    This file is to run against a live DSpace for the purposes of testing the code.
    PolicyApplicationFilter  
    PolicyPatternManager
    This class is responsible for applying a consistent and coherent set of resource policies to items it is handed.
